summary: "2012" is a 2009 American science fiction disaster movie directed by Roland Emmerich. It stars John Cusack and Chiwetel Ejiofor, who try to survive global catastrophes like earthquakes, volcanoes, and floods. Filming started in Vancouver in 2008. The film was a commercial success, making over $791 million worldwide. It received mixed reviews but was nominated for best visual effects at several award shows.
title: 2012 (film)
